Striving for the excellence of 21 million specially abled resources and skills
Our mission is to become the most comprehensive career universe and network for people with special abilities across India.

Our vision is to build a career platform of over 1,000,000 interconnected specially abled individuals. Provide them with the best career resources and give them access to jobs in over 100 leading companies across India.
To enrol specially abled in economic activity through Spectraverse. This enrolment is analysed to have a potential effect on GDP of country.
